entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
